TopicTitle: In the gamesave, where is the line for the amount of time your game has been running?

Articles.Content: That is, when you start a new save you begin at Year 0, Day 0. There was a mod that previously allowed you to change this so I understand that is able to be changed, but where is the line that would allow me to configure this? When I play I enjoy RPing, and beginning at year 0 doesn't feel right.
I looked through the persistence file and didn't find it. It may be simpler to just go to the space center at time warp a bit. Just a suggestion.

Well, I used to use the mod to start my game past Year 100, I'm not sure how long it'd take to get that far but I hope I can find a way to not do that.
Yah, I wouldn't imagine you'd wanna time warp that way. At 10000x time warp that'd still take 25 hours real time.

IIRC there should be a line starting 'UT' or 'UniversalTime' or something similar. It represents the number of seconds since the epoch (i.e. game start). If you edit the number it should change the in-game time.

I'll check the exact line when I get to my PC later tonight.

It says UT=(some number) if I remember right, and it's the time in seconds.
